member.name: F:ifc.ifc_ps.ps_sw
member.summary: To read the status of push buttons on PS2 controller.

member.name: F:ifc.ifc_ps.ps_joy
member.summary: To read the analog value of joystick on PS2 controller.

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Byte)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_ps class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-PS01.
member.param: Address for IFC-PS01, in range of 0 to 63. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_ps class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-PS01.
member.param: Address for IFC-PS01, in range of 0 to 63. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps.ps_vibrate(System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: To control the vibrator motors on PS2 controller.
member.param: Vibrator motors on PS2 controller in range of 1 to 2. (byte)
True to turn ON and false to turn OFF the selected vibrator motor. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps.ps_vibrate(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: To control the vibrator motors on PS2 controller.
member.param: Vibrator motors on PS2 controller in range of 1 to 2. (byte)
For Motor 1, the valid value for vibrate is 1 to turn ON and 0 to turn OFF. For Motor 2, the valid value will be in range of 0 to 255 which represent the percentage of the vibration. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps.ps_vibrate(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: To control the vibrator motors on PS2 controller.
member.param: Vibrator motors on PS2 controller in range of 1 to 2. (int)
True to turn ON and false to turn OFF the selected vibrator motor. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps.ps_vibrate(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: To control the vibrator motors on PS2 controller.
member.param: Vibrator motors on PS2 controller in range of 1 to 2. (int)
For Motor 1, the valid value for vibrate is 1 to turn ON and 0 to turn OFF. For Motor 2, the valid value will be in range of 0 to 255 which represent the percentage of the vibration. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps.ps_stat
member.summary: To check the connectivity of PS2 controller to IFC-PS01
member.returns: Return true if PS2 controller is connected to IFC-PS01. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_lx
member.returns: Return the joystick information in x-axis. The value is around 128 when the joystick is at center, 0 when the joystick is at left side, and 255 when the joystick is at the right side. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_ly
member.returns: Return the joystick information in y-axis. The value is around 128 when the joystick is at center, 0 when the joystick is at upper side, and 255 when the joystick is at the lower side. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_rx
member.returns: Return the joystick information in x-axis. The value is around 128 when the joystick is at center, 0 when the joystick is at left side, and 255 when the joystick is at the right side. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_ry
member.returns: Return the joystick information in y-axis. The value is around 128 when the joystick is at center, 0 when the joystick is at upper side, and 255 when the joystick is at the lower side. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_lu
member.returns: Return the joystick information in up direction. The value is 0 when the joystick is at center or lower, and the value change to 100 when the joystick is being moved up. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_ld
member.returns: Return the joystick information in down direction. The value is 0 when the joystick is at center or upper, and the value change to 100 when the joystick is being moved down. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_ll
member.returns: Return the joystick information in left direction. The value is 0 when the joystick is at center or right, and the value change to 100 when the joystick is being moved to left. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_lr
member.returns: Return the joystick information in right direction. The value is 0 when the joystick is at center or left, and the value change to 100 when the joystick is being moved to right. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_ru
member.returns: Return the joystick information in up direction. The value is 0 when the joystick is at center or lower, and the value change to 100 when the joystick is being moved up. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_rd
member.returns: Return the joystick information in down direction. The value is 0 when the joystick is at center or upper, and the value change to 100 when the joystick is being moved down. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_rl
member.returns: Return the joystick information in left direction. The value is 0 when the joystick is at center or right, and the value change to 100 when the joystick is being moved to left. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_ps._ps_joy.joy_rr
member.returns: Return the joystick information in right direction. The value is 0 when the joystick is at center or left, and the value change to 100 when the joystick is being moved to right. (byte)
